topic.title: 4chan down?
topic.body: Have they finally taken it down? I was getting intermittent CloudFlare errors here and there since the 6th, but in the last 15 minutes, it's a constant error no matter what board/thread. Has the blackout begun?

1610154957_1HesgY39DUQrf3M1WCn6q66f69VRR.body: Why are comments sorted from newest to oldest. I open a new thread and have to scroll to the bottom and scroll up if I want to read it correctly. This is some twitter-level retardation. Or am I the retard. How do we change the sorting order?

> [saintlouis](#comment_1_1BAG93hXwWmaDRyjYCGP8QLpwZ6YXVSvo4): Same hereI feel like 1995 all over again.Hope it's gonna evolve quick

Compared to 1995 this is pretty damn slick. Hell, I had half a mind to check out usenet again with everything going on. Settled on this for now. There's some kinks to work out. Hopefully we can breathe some life into this place.

> [bimmyql](#comment_27_1yhTF4WKRZsCBdVeh8fwPj14zAiEdtAXW): don't ruin another platform please
> [bimmyql](#comment_28_1yhTF4WKRZsCBdVeh8fwPj14zAiEdtAXW): ">" ">" ">" /pol/ [...]
Who are you quoting faggot

1610876302_14xmVmzUMAx4egBicMbRNkqkrrgRg.body:
> [userneonshine](#comment_19_1HesgY39DUQrf3M1WCn6q66f69VRRJc57E): Down for me too. Hope your buckled in and invited as many anons as you could

Letting ZeroNet be known on the #pol IRC chat, but there's really only ever 30-50 people in there. We're on our own now.
